survey_name: Urban Commuter Bike Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences, satisfaction levels, and challenges faced by urban commuters who use bicycles as their primary mode of transportation.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a bicycle for commuting in urban areas?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use a bicycle for commuting in urban areas?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose to commute by bicycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose to commute by bicycle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when commuting by bicycle in urban areas?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow detailed responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when commuting by bicycle in urban areas?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bicycle lanes in your city?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bicycle lanes in your city?

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use your bicycle more frequently for commuting?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed suggestions. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use your bicycle more frequently for commuting?
